mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We aim to provide small and medium shipping companies with professional tracking tools that were previously only available to large corporations.

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.content: Many small shipping companies struggle to provide real-time tracking to their customers. TrakoShip makes this easy and affordable.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the leading shipment tracking platform for small and medium businesses worldwide.
